The dense caption confirms that they are enjoying quality time together in the same position. Since there is no prior context or previous segments to compare with, we can only analyze this single segment. The little girl remains in one location throughout this part of the video. Therefore, the number of times she changes her location in this segment is zero. Given the options, none of them directly state zero changes, so the best choice is Z: no right option.
</think>

The dense caption confirms that the girl moves from the bed to the floor and then out of the room. This suggests that the little girl changes her location twice in the video: once from the bed to the floor and then from the room to outside. Therefore, the number of times she changes her location is twice. Option C (Twice) matches this observation.
</think>
